Master Answer:
Our tips for locating immunization records are found here. In BC, routine rubella and measles vaccines began in 1969-1970 and chickenpox (varicella) vaccine in 2004.
Immunization Nurse
Master Question: I was born in Victoria, BC in 1954 and received my childhood vaccinations while we were living there up until age 6. How can I obtain records for chickenpox and MMR or any other vaccinations I received. I have been living in Ontario since 1966.
